com.inherentgames

Class BBWordObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.threed.jpct.Object3D
      • com.inherentgames.BBWordObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BBBubble

    public class BBWordObject
extends com.threed.jpct.Object3D
    Author:
    Tyler An Extension of the JPCT-AE class Object3D. This handles all of the objects in a room. The key addition here is that BBWordObjects have words and articles associated with them.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • BBWordObject

        public BBWordObject(BBWordObject obj)
        The constructor for BBWordObject. Sets the initial rotation of the object (so it can be rotate back if the game is reset), the article, names, and collisionMode.
        Parameters:
        obj - - the BBWordObject to base this BBWordObject off of

      • BBWordObject

        public BBWordObject(com.threed.jpct.Object3D obj,
            com.threed.jpct.SimpleVector rotationAxis,
            java.lang.String name,
            BBWordObject.Gender article)
        The constructor for BBWordObject. Sets the initial rotation of the object (so it can be rotate back if the game is reset), the article, names, and collisionMode.
        Parameters:
        obj - - the Object3D to base this BBWordObject off of
        rotationAxis - - the vector to rotate the object by (in radians)
        name - - the english name of the object
        article - - the spanish gender of the object
